_source.short_desc: Quorum is public affairs software that helps you work smarter and move faster.
_source.long_desc: Work smarter and move faster to achieve your policy goals with Quorum's public affairs software. Map and track your entire policy landscape, move the needle on key issues, and use data to report on your successes and inform your strategy. Learn why public affairs and advocacy teams at Toyota, the Wounded Warrior Project, and the American Beverage Association rave about Quorum at https://www.quorum.us.
_source.target_audience: Best for teams working in policy, advocacy and public affairs. Quorum helps corporations, nonprofits, associations, government agencies, and consulting firms achieve their goals.

related_products.short_desc: The best CRM for advocates. It helps manage Contacts, Projects, and Timesheets. It's great because it sits right within your Outlook.
related_products.features:
The best CRM for advocates. It helps you manage your Clients and Projects right from within Microsoft Outlook. Our mobile and web apps allow you to stay on top even on the go.

Organize emails and meetings automatically by projects, automate repetitive tasks with workflow, track your time, customize forms, and much more.

related_products.short_desc: Influitive is a full-stack customer marketing platform that combines segmentation and engagement mechanics to mobilize customers.
related_products.features: Influitive is a full-stack customer marketing platform. Influitive combines advanced segmentation and engagement mechanics to mobilize customers and put social proof at your fingertips. From video testimonials and 3rd party reviews to referrals and references, the Influitive platform will deliver tangible results and measurable ROI.

related_products.short_desc: InviteReferrals is Easy to Setup Advocacy Marketing Software to setup Advocacy program like Refer a friend, Tell a friend, Refer & Earn
related_products.features:
InviteReferrals is Easy to Setup Referral Marketing Software to setup Advocacy program like Refer a friend, Tell a friend, Refer & Earn Programs. Grow your sales through word-of-mouth marketing, Affiliate Marketing.
- Affiliate Program
- Advocacy Referral
- Loyalty Program
- Ecommerce Referral Program
- BFSI Referral Program

Features Includes:
1. Instant Gratification
2. Loyalty Points
3. Wallet Integration
4. Multiple Campaigns
5. Multiple Language.
6. Custom Requirements

related_products.short_desc: Take action on the legislation and regulations that matter to you. Support or fight initiatives at the local, state, or federal levels.
related_products.features: Best-in-class address matching connects your advocates with their local, state, and federal lawmakers, ensuring your message is heard by those in power. Reach supporters via email, text, or push notification. Send newsletters, polls, and updates year-round so your base is ready to act next time key legislation is on the table. Our mobile action center helps manage fly-ins and sync notes from meetings.

related_products.short_desc: The #1 supporter engagement platform for nonprofits, Salsa's platform includes marketing automation, fundraising, and donor management.
related_products.features: The #1 supporter engagement platform for nonprofits,  Salsa offers a purpose built marketing automation, fundraising, and donor management system that will help your organization grow. Use Salsa Engage with Salsa CRM or integrate to your CRM to work efficiently and effectively.  Salesforce user?  We work with all Salesforce standard versions and the Nonprofit Success Pack . Sign up for a demo to learn how clients average 28% YOY donation growth and increased donor retention.

related_products.short_desc: Move supporters to action both online and offline with EveryAction's industry-leading advocacy solutions on a unified CRM.
related_products.features: Move your supporters to action and easily track your impact with industry-leading digital and in-person advocacy tools. EveryAction's powerful, unified nonprofit CRM enables nonprofits of all sizes to track, grow, and harness supporter engagement to make change from local to federal levels. Digital advocacy solutions include email, social media, and click-to-call advocacy forms, all run from the same CRM as event and volunteer management tools for a fully integrated advocacy program.

related_products.short_desc: A cloud-based donor management software that provides robust, user-friendly tools for nonprofits of all sizes.
related_products.features: A cloud-based donor management software that provides robust, user-friendly tools for nonprofits of all sizes.

related_products.short_desc: Advocacy platform that gives your employees a simple way to share curated, pre-approved content across their social network.
related_products.features: Bambu by Sprout Social is an advocacy platform that gives your employees a simple way to share curated content across their social networks, dramatically increasing your reach on social media.

related_products.short_desc: Build petition, event, and other action pages, process and manage donations, and handle email and social outreach, all in one place.
related_products.features: NationBuilder powers thousands of the world's most high-stakes campaigns and movements. Engage your advocates when it matters most using one intuitive system. This includes a fully-integrated website and supporter database, online petitions, powerful field tools, streamlined one-time and recurring donations, and personalized email and texting. Bring your database to life with dynamic supporter profiles that update with every interaction. Includes unlimited users and unlimited email blasts.

related_products.short_desc: Capitol Canar is the world's leading advocacy technology company, helping organizations educate, inspire and mobilize their supporters.
related_products.features: Capitol Canary is the world's leading technology company for advocacy at scale and at the grassroots level. Built to help you deliver on your mission, our platform has helped millions of advocates make more than 126 million connections with elected officials to positively impact policy. We can help you educate, inspire, and mobilize your supporters and we'll help you be as organized and productive as possible while doing it.

related_products.short_desc: The fastest and easiest way to create a successful Employee Advocacy program.
related_products.features: SocialHP is enterprise grade Employee Advocacy software for marketing professionals. Our "never login" philosophy means there's no software for your team to learn and no need for ongoing training. Locked calendars are the secret to our 100% adoption and retention rates. Stage marketing-ready social media content on behalf of your entire team. We think our 99.9% all-time customer renewal rate speaks for itself. Chat with one of our Experts today.

Customer engagement software often includes digital and mobile engagement tools, live chat, gamification options, personalized web content, and dynamic forms. Related tools can be found in the Customer Relationship Management software, Customer Loyalty software, Customer Satisfaction software, Gamification software, and Blog software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Political Campaign software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Political Campaign tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Political Campaign software provides financial and management tools, contribution tracking, a voter database, and other features to help political candidates and PACs more effectively manage campaigns. Campaign managers use these software applications to efficiently identify likely donors, target voters for outreach efforts, manage volunteers, track contributions, and assess the effectiveness of campaigns. Political Campaign software also typically offers demographic and voter behavior data, polling tools, call center integration and other campaign management necessities such as regulatory compliance monitoring. Political Campaign software is related to Fundraising software.

related_categories.description: Referral software helps companies promote their service more effectively by using their customer base as a source for additional sales leads. Typical features of this software include referral tracking, reward distribution and testimonial management. Specific kinds of Referral software are targeted toward Human Resource departments and help establish employee referral programs and lower an organization's cost-per-hire. For related software solutions see Marketing Automation software, Lead Management software, Human Resource software and Customer Reference Management software.

The software combines emails, event registration, membership, website design, and payment processing all in one place. A StarChapter Project Manager will set up your service with you, coordinate the project for you, and train users even when the board transitions. ClubExpress combines your association web site with the membership database, online member signups/renewals/expirations, event calendar & registration, credit-card processing, membership directory, committees, forums, documents, interests, benefits, etc. We use state-of-the-art security, there's no advertising and associations own their data at all times.

related_categories.description: HOA software, or Homeowners Association software, is designed for the particular needs of single-family home developments, condominiums (Condos), and other similar communities and homeowner associations with features similar to Property Management and Fund Accounting software. Standard features include the ability to track information about homeowners and condo association participants, create community forums, and manage member meetings. HOA software is related to Membership Management software and Association Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Membership Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Membership Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Membership Management software automates the management of membership within associations, communities ,and other member-based organizations. These software packages typically offer many features to empower and inform group members as well as administration and business process tools for organizations. A variety of membership-oriented groups use these software applications to communicate with their constituents, share resources, promote events, and collect fees as well as to recruit and retain members. Membership Management software is related to Association Management software, Church Management software and Club Management software.
